Keith Pollard (/ˈpɑːlərd/; amụrụ na Jenụwarị 20, 1950) bụ onye America na-ese akwụkwọ ọchị. N'ịbụ onye sitere na mpaghara Detroit, a maara Pollard nke ọma maka ọrụ ya n'otu oge na ihe nkiri Marvel Comics nke gụnyere The Amazing Spider-Man, Fantastic Four, na Thor na ngwụsị afọ 1970 - mmalite afọ 1980.
Keith Pollard mere ihe nkiri mbụ ya na 1974 na ihe nkiri ndị dị ka Master of Kung Fu, Deadly Hands of Kung Fu, Astonishing Tales, na Black Goliath
N'etiti afọ ndị 1970 ọ dọpụtakwara mkpuchi mbụ maka ụfọdụ n'ime utu aha kwa izu na akara Marvel UK
Ọ bụ onye na-ede akwụkwọ mgbe niile nke The Amazing Spider-Man site na mbipụta #186 (Nov
1978) ruo mbipụta #205 (June 1980) ma dee ihe nkwado na The Amazing Spider-Man Annual #15 (1981)
Ya na onye edemede Marv Wolfman, Pollard webatara Black Cat na The Amazing Spider-Man #194 (July 1979). Wolfman na Pollard bụ ndị otu keputara Fantastic Four #200 (Nov
Pollard bụkwa onye na-ede akwụkwọ mgbe niile nke mbipụta Thor #286-320
Na 1982, Pollard kwagara DC Comics ebe o sere akụkụ nke Wonder Woman #300 (Feb
1983) wee malite usoro Vigilante na Marv Wolfman. Ya na Elliot S
Maggin kere Kristin Wells version nke Superwoman na DC Comics Presents Annual #2 (1983).

Pollard na Stan Lee mepụtara akwụkwọ ọgụgụ Silver Surfer: The Enslavers graphic novel na 1990. Ná mmalite afọ ndị 1990, ọ sere profaịlụ njirimara niile maka Official Handbook of the Marvel Universe Master Edition
Pollard hapụrụ ihe ọchị na 1996, ọ bụ ezie na ọ na-apụta mgbe ụfọdụ na mgbakọ akwụkwọ ọchị.
